name: Earok Panorama
short_description:
This is an example of how to view cylindrical panoramas in multiple programming languages. Platforms included: 

•Html5[Web]
•Flash[Web,Native]
•Windows8[Html5,Flash,Web,Native]
•WindowsDesktop[Html5,Flash,Web,Native]
•MacOSX[Html5,Flash,Web,Native]
•Linux[Html5,Flash,Web,Native]
•WindowsPhone[Xna,Html5,Web,Native]
•Android[Html5,Flash,Web,Native]
•iOS[Html5,Web,Native]
•3DSOperaBrowser[Flash,Web]
•PlaystationMobile[Flash,Web,Native]
•XBox360LIVE[Xna,Native]
•OUYAConsole[Android,Native]
•WiiOperaBrowser[Flash,Web]
•Python[Windows,Mac,Linux,iOS]
•BlitzMax[Windows,Mac,Linux]
•MonkeyCoder[AllOfTheAbove]

Get all available platforms here:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/79893663/AdventureWindow/MonkeyPanorama/panorama.zip

More Platform Download Links Coming Soon! Not everything listed above is available yet.
TKG
summary: Open source, multi-platform, cylindrical panorama viewer
